input.sentences: [male] was to be given a special award tonight .
with his friends and colleagues around with him .
[male] was really proud of all the work he had done for the company .
they give him this award because he had been such a hard loyal worker for the company .
it 's all smiles as [male] celebrates his award .
output.sentences: Tonight a male employee, who has worked very hard, is getting special recognition.
His friends and colleagues are honoring him at an event specifically for him.
The well-regarded male is deservedly proud of his achievement and enjoys his many congratulations.
His loyal and hard work won him accolades and a plaque and salary boost.
This proud male worker is all smiles as he beams and celebrates with his co-workers.
